recipe.title: Bibb Lettuce Salad with Persimmons and Candied Pecans
ingredients: 3/4 cup whole-berry cranberry sauce (purchased or homemade)
2 heads of Bibb lettuce, coarsely torn
instructions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in medium bowl; whisk in oil. Season with salt and pepper. Mound lettuce in center of 8 plates. Top each with persimmon slices, then drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cheese and Candied Pecans.
